credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Knife
description: Knife with straight sided tapering handle engraved with figures of Perveirs ?, Hermurs ?, scenes from a tale invluding Susannah and the Elders, grotesques and masks. Shaped and pierced terminal with gilt baluster finial; pointed steel blade.
name: Knife
